headline: Coinbase-backed exchange users report sudden withdrawal problems
summary: Users on the popular cryptocurrency trading platform, Lighter, are reportedly unable to withdraw funds currently, Wu Blockchain reported on Dec. 30. The development took place on a day when Lighter's native token made its debut. Backed by investors like Coinbase (Nasdaq: COIN) and ...

headline: Bitcoin rises above $89,000, showing rare gain in U.S. trading
summary: Open interest data suggests the advance is likely short-covering, rather than fresh longs entering the market.

headline: Robinhood price target lowered to $135 from $145 at Needham
summary: Needham lowered the firm’s price target on Robinhood (HOOD) to $135 from $145 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm lowered its estimates and price targets across the cryptoasset sector as it sees continued weakness in crypto volumes for the next couple quarters.
